name: Green Climate Fund Pledges- GCF (2017)
title: Green Climate Fund Pledges- GCF (2017)
description: Advanced economies have formally agreed to jointly mobilize USD 100 billion per year by 2020, from a variety of sources, to address the pressing mitigation and adaptation needs of developing countries.

sources.name: Green Climate Fund Pledges - GCF (2017)
sources.dataPublisherSource: Original sources from the GCF datasets.
sources.additionalInfo: Advanced economies have formally agreed to jointly mobilize USD 100 billion per year by 2020, from a variety of sources, to address the pressing mitigation and adaptation needs of developing countries.

fields.name: Green Climate Fund Pledges (USD per capita) (GCF (2017))
fields.description: Measures USD pledged per capita to the Green Climate Fund (GDF).
